(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (NP (DT this))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (JJ very) (NN fun))
        (VP (VBG blog)
          (NP (NN entry))
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB write)))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(fun-6, Now-1)
nsubj(fun-6, this-2)
cop(fun-6, was-3)
det(fun-6, a-4)
amod(fun-6, very-5)
root(ROOT-0, fun-6)
partmod(fun-6, blog-7)
dobj(blog-7, entry-8)
aux(write-10, to-9)
xcomp(blog-7, write-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (PRP$ Our) (NN group))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (NNS makankakis))))
    (VP (VBD visited)
      (NP
        (NP (NNP Serangoon) (NNP Way) (NNP Food))
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (NN center)
              (CC and)
              (NN carnineviand))
            (VP (VBD told)
              (NP (PRP me))
              (PP (IN about)
                (NP (DT this) (JJ famous) (NNP Newton) (NNP Char) (NNP Kway) (NNP Teow) (NN stall))))))))
    (. .)))

            (NP (DT the) (NN afternoon))))))

      (NP (EX there))

  (S
    (S
      (NP

          (NP (DT the) (NN wok))))

        (VP (VB be)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (PRP$ his) (CD 70) (NNS 's))))))

      (NP (PRP he))
      (VP (VBD was)

          (NP (DT that) (NN wok))

    (. .)))

pobj(for-2, carnineviand-3)
poss(faith-5, whose-4)
nsubjpass(restored-8, faith-5)
auxpass(restored-8, was-6)
advmod(restored-8, miraculously-7)
dep(Especially-1, restored-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (JJ big) (NN difference))
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (DT this) (NNP Char) (NNP Kway) (NNP Teow))))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (JJ old) (NN man))
          (VP (VBZ uses)
            (S
              (NP (DT a) (NN seafood) (NN broth))
              (VP (VBN made)
                (PP (IN from)
                  (NP (RB freshly) (JJ blanched) (NNS squids)))
                (, ,)))))))))


det(difference-3, The-1)
amod(difference-3, big-2)
nsubj(was-9, difference-3)
prep(difference-3, with-4)
det(Teow-8, this-5)
nn(Teow-8, Char-6)
nn(Teow-8, Kway-7)
pobj(with-4, Teow-8)
root(ROOT-0, was-9)
mark(uses-14, that-10)
det(man-13, the-11)
amod(man-13, old-12)
nsubj(uses-14, man-13)
ccomp(was-9, uses-14)
det(broth-17, a-15)
nn(broth-17, seafood-16)
nsubj(made-18, broth-17)
dep(uses-14, made-18)
prep(made-18, from-19)
advmod(squids-22, freshly-20)
amod(squids-22, blanched-21)
pobj(from-19, squids-22)

  (S
    (NP (NNS prawns)
      (CC and)
      (NNS cockles))
    (VP (TO to)
      (VP (VB wet)
        (NP
          (NP (PRP$ his) (NNP Char) (NNP Kway) (NNP Teow))
          (PP (RB instead) (IN of)
            (NP (JJ plain) (NN water))))))
    (. .)))

    (VP (VBD gave)
      (NP (DT the) (NNP Char) (NNP Kway) (NNP Teow))

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (DT A) (NNP Char) (NNP Kway) (NNP Teow) (NN worth))
    (VP (VBG going)
      (ADVP (RB back))
      (PP (IN for)))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (VP (VBN Conclusion)
        (S
          (ADJP (DT Another) (RB really) (JJ good))
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Char) (NNP Kway) (NNP Teow))
            (PP (CC but)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the)
                  (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ endearing)))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT all)))))))))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN sight))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT a)
              (ADJP (CD 70) (NN year) (JJ old))
              (NN man))
            (VP (VBG doing)
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WP what))
                (S
                  (NP (PRP he))
                  (VP (VBZ has)
                    (VP (VBN been)
                      (VP (VBG doing)
                        (PP (IN for)
                          (NP (CD 40) (NNS years)))
                        (SBAR (RB as) (IN if)
                          (S
                            (NP (PRP he))
                            (VP (VBD had)
                              (ADVP (RB just))
                              (VP (VBN started)
                                (S
                                  (VP (VBG doing)
                                    (NP (PRP it))
                                    (NP (NN yesterday))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


csubj(sight-16, Conclusion-1)
dep(good-4, Another-2)
advmod(good-4, really-3)
acomp(Conclusion-1, good-4)
nn(Teow-7, Char-5)
nn(Teow-7, Kway-6)
dep(good-4, Teow-7)
prep(Teow-7, but-8)
det(endearing-11, the-9)
advmod(endearing-11, most-10)
dep(but-8, endearing-11)
prep(endearing-11, of-12)
pobj(of-12, all-13)
cop(sight-16, was-14)
det(sight-16, the-15)
root(ROOT-0, sight-16)
prep(sight-16, of-17)
det(man-22, a-18)
number(old-21, 70-19)
npadvmod(old-21, year-20)
amod(man-22, old-21)
pobj(of-17, man-22)
partmod(man-22, doing-23)
dobj(doing-28, what-24)
nsubj(doing-28, he-25)
aux(doing-28, has-26)
aux(doing-28, been-27)
ccomp(doing-23, doing-28)
prep(doing-28, for-29)
num(years-31, 40-30)
pobj(for-29, years-31)
advmod(started-37, as-32)
mark(started-37, if-33)
nsubj(started-37, he-34)
aux(started-37, had-35)
advmod(started-37, just-36)

dobj(doing-38, it-39)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT That))
    (VP (VBZ ,))))


nsubj(,-2, That-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS friends))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP what))
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBP call)
            (NP (NNP PASSION))))))
    (. .)))


poss(friends-2, my-1)
nsubj(is-3, friends-2)
root(ROOT-0, is-3)
dobj(call-6, what-4)
nsubj(call-6, I-5)
ccomp(is-3, call-6)
dobj(call-6, PASSION-7)


(ROOT
  (S (CC And)
    (NP (NNP THAT))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP what))
        (S
          (VP (VBZ makes)
            (S
              (NP (PRP$ his) (NNP Char) (NNP Kway) (NNP Teow))
              (ADJP (JJ great)))))))
    (. .)))


cc(is-3, And-1)
nsubj(is-3, THAT-2)
root(ROOT-0, is-3)
nsubj(makes-5, what-4)
ccomp(is-3, makes-5)
poss(Teow-9, his-6)
nn(Teow-9, Char-7)
nn(Teow-9, Kway-8)
nsubj(great-10, Teow-9)
xcomp(makes-5, great-10)
